pinyin: Bei3 jing1 Zhong1 yi1 yao4 Da4 xue2

definition: abbr. for Beijing/surname Jing/Jing ethnic minority
capital city of a country/big/algebraic term for a large number (old)/artificial mound (old)
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Lilly Lerer is a visiting scholar at the Beijing University of Chinese Medicine.
sentences.chinese: 莉莉是北京中醫藥大學的訪問學者。

sentences.english: Now, it has been applied to the researches of biorhythm in Beijing Univsersity of Traditional Chinese Medicine and Pharmacy.
sentences.chinese: 本系統已應用於北京中醫藥大學的生命節律研究。

sentences.english: We welcomed the professors of Beijing University of Traditional Chinese Medicine with warm applause.
sentences.chinese: 我們熱烈鼓掌歡迎北京中醫藥大學的教授們。
